Text.Page:
Mission Orders

The creatures of Darkquaver Woods have inexplicably turned against the federation.

Restore order by killing {@LinkCreature:56#16#Darkquaver hyenas}, {@LinkCreature:56#17#razortusk warthogs}, {@LinkCreature:55#1#mad sporewalkers}, and {@LinkCreature:55#11#silvermane unicorns}.

Report to Belva at Darkquaver Garrison when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
